title: Where has my music gone? Google Pixel 3 Phone
content:
I went to my phone this morning to "Play Music" where I have downloaded about 300 songs and had a screen pop up saying ""Google Play Music is no longer available". No warning for this by the way! It suggested I could transfer my library which I have tried to do but only 22 songs went across. And it appears I can only listen to music if I am connected to the internet.
My question is:
1. Is there a music app that I can download that will allow me to listen to my 300 songs and not be connected to the internet?
